Using Grimwire Getting Started

The nightly build of Grimwire is kept active at http://grimwire.github.io/grimwire/. To host your own deployment:

git clone https://github.com/grimwire/grimwire.git grimwire
cd grimwire
python -m SimpleHTTPServer
# open http://localhost:8000 in your browser

If you plan on developing Grimwire's core libraries, you'll need to clone its submodules (the Local API) and run the build scripts. Read the "Building" docs for detailed instructions. Most developers, however (including service hosts) can use the precompiled javascript included in the Grimwire repository by default.

How to Use Grimwire

Grimwire is not a typical Javascript framework. In fact, it's more accurate to view it as a platform, like Wordpress (but without the backend). We recommend that you serve it statically at the root URL of your service, then host other resources at sub-URIs to
